name: Everest Base Camp
description: A challenging trek to the base of the world's highest mountain.

name: Annapurna Circuit
description: A classic trek around the Annapurna massif.

name: Nagarkot
description: A popular spot for sunrise and sunset views over the Himalayas.

name: Dhulikhel
description: A serene spot offering panoramic views of the Himalayas and surrounding valleys.

name: Bhaktapur Durbar Square
description: An ancient square known for its historic temples and pagodas.

name: Patan Durbar Square
description: A historic square in Lalitpur with beautiful architecture and temples.

name: Swayambhunath (Monkey Temple)
description: An ancient religious complex atop a hill with panoramic views of Kathmandu.

name: Boudhanath Stupa
description: One of the largest stupas in Nepal, a significant Buddhist pilgrimage site.

name: Chandragiri Hill
description: A popular hill station with stunning views of the Himalayas and Kathmandu Valley.

name: Gosaikunda
description: A sacred lake trek in Langtang National Park.

name: Poon Hill
description: A short trek offering panoramic views of the Annapurna range.

name: Langtang Valley
description: A scenic trek through the Langtang National Park.

name: Upper Mustang
description: A cultural trek through the ancient kingdom of Mustang.

name: Manaslu Circuit
description: A challenging trek around the Manaslu massif.

name: Helambu Trek
description: A short and easy trek near Kathmandu.

name: Rara Lake
description: A trek to the largest lake in Nepal.

name: Ghorepani
description: A popular trekking route in the Annapurna region.

name: Kanchenjunga Base Camp
description: A remote trek to the base of the third highest mountain in the world.

name: Makalu Base Camp
description: A challenging trek to the base of the fifth highest mountain in the world.

name: Tilicho Lake
description: A trek to one of the highest lakes in the world.

name: Mardi Himal
description: A less crowded trek in the Annapurna region.

name: Dhampus Trek
description: A short and easy trek near Pokhara.

name: Khopra Ridge
description: A less-traveled trek with stunning views of the Annapurna and Dhaulagiri ranges.

name: Panchase Trek
description: A short and easy trek near Pokhara with views of the Annapurna range.

name: Nar Phu Valley
description: A remote trek in the Annapurna region exploring ancient villages.

name: Dhaulagiri Circuit
description: A challenging trek around the Dhaulagiri massif.

name: Tsum Valley
description: A cultural trek in the Manaslu region exploring Tibetan-influenced villages.

name: Lukla
description: The gateway to the Everest region, popular for its stunning mountain views.

name: Kirtipur
description: A historic town with rich cultural heritage and panoramic views.

name: Rani Pokhari
description: A historic pond in Kathmandu with beautiful surroundings.

name: Garden of Dreams
description: A peaceful and beautifully landscaped garden in Kathmandu.

name: Thamel
description: A vibrant area in Kathmandu known for its shops, restaurants, and nightlife.

name: Gokyo Lakes
description: A trek to a series of beautiful high-altitude lakes in the Everest region.

name: Sikles
description: A culturally rich trek offering views of the Annapurna and Machapuchare mountains.

name: Chisapani
description: A short trek from Kathmandu offering great views of the Himalayas.

name: Kakani
description: A scenic spot offering views of the Kathmandu Valley and the Himalayas.

name: Namo Buddha
description: A significant Buddhist pilgrimage site with beautiful views and monastery.

name: Gauri Shankar
description: A sacred mountain and a challenging trek in the Rolwaling region.

name: Jomsom
description: A gateway to the Mustang region with stunning landscapes.

name: Lumbini
description: The birthplace of Buddha, a significant pilgrimage site.

name: Kushma
description: A scenic spot known for its stunning views of the Kali Gandaki Gorge.

name: Gosaikunda Lake
description: A high-altitude lake trek known for its spiritual significance and stunning views.

name: Sundarijal
description: A popular destination for a short trek and beautiful waterfalls near Kathmandu.
